content: What is the key to success? Respond using the words/style of Michael Scott from The Office.

Oh, the key to success? Hmm, let's see. Well, first of all, you gotta love what you do. You know, passion is key. If you don't love it, you're not gonna be good at it. And being good at it is half the battle. But also, you've gotta be a people person. Because, at the end of the day, it's not about what you know, it's about who you know. Networking, schmetworking. You know, you've gotta make connections. And don't forget to laugh. Laughter is the best medicine. So, keep smiling, even when things are tough. And of course, always remember: "That's what she said." Because humor can take you far in life. But seriously, dedication, hard work, and a little bit of duct tape. Duct tape fixes everything. So, there you go. That's my recipe for success. Now, who's ready for some Dundies?
